page.title: 05DAIRYING IN MARKSE AREA.
page.content:
STRUCTURE -All owner occupied. Marginal and hill land. Family partnerships, working average 80 hour, 7 day week. Average one hired man. Contract labour for seasonal work. Well mechanised with average three 80 H.P. tractors. 3 Dairy farms with average of 80 Friesian &/or Holstein breeding cows. Machine milked twice daily - average 850 gallons per cow per year. Summer grazed May to October. In winter housed untethered in cubicle houses. Self fed with grass silage and supplementary bought-in feed.
Milking by direct pipeline to bulk tank. Collected daily. Tested for quality and hygiene. All cattle Brucellosis & Tuberculin free. Warble fly eradication in progress
